00013 parentItem_(parent), rowNumber_(row) {
00014 }

00016 // The destructor
00017 IPXactItem::~IPXactItem() {
00018         // free up allocated memory
00019         childItems_.clear();
00020 }
00021 
00022 // get the wrapped node
00023 QDomNode* IPXactItem::node() {
00024         return &domNode_;
00025 }
00026 
00027 // create a new wrapper
00028 IPXactItem *IPXactItem::child(int index) {
00029         // if the item is already wrapped then pointer to it is returned
00030         if (childItems_.contains(index)) {
00031                 return childItems_[index].data();
00032         }
00033 
00034         // a new wrapper is constructed and a pointer returned
00035         if (index >= 0 && index < domNode_.childNodes().count()) {
00036                 QDomNode childNode = domNode_.childNodes().item(index);
00037                 IPXactItem *child = new IPXactItem(childNode, index, this);
00038                 childItems_[index] = QSharedPointer<IPXactItem>(child);
00039                 return child;
00040         }
00041         // no valid wrapper was created
00042         return 0;
00043 }
00044 
00045 // get the row number
00046 int IPXactItem::row() {
00047         return rowNumber_;
00048 }
00049 
00050 // get the parent of the item
00051 IPXactItem *IPXactItem::parent() {
00052         return parentItem_;
00053 }
